Inside Macintosh: Cyberdog Programmer's Kit / Part 3 - Cyberdog Reference
Chapter 7 - Classes and Methods / CyberSession

GetODSession

Retrieves the OpenDoc session object for this Cyberdog session.

ODSession GetODSession ();
return value
The ODSession object.
DISCUSSION
You call this method to retrieve a reference to the ODSession object associated with the current Cyberdog session.

Do not subclass this class.
